item.title: ionic命令行Generate体验总结
item.description:
ionic命令行Generate体验总结

工具简述 Description

Ionic now provides a generator function to create pages and services for your app. This makes going from a basic app to a full featured app with navigation much easier.

To create a page you can use the following command:

# ionic g page <PageName>
ionic g page MyAboutPage

√ Create app/pages/my-about-page/my-about-page.html
√ Create app/pages/my-about-page/my-about-page.js
√ Create app/pages/my-about-page/my-about-page.scss

This will give you a html file, sass file, and a js file with your component definition.

To create a service, you can replace page with provider:

ionic g provider MyData

√ Create app/pages/my-data/my-data.js

This will create a standard class with a simple http get request using Angular’s http class.

命名规范 A quick note on naming conventions

Ionic 2 uses kebob-casing for file names (my-about-page.html) and css classes (.my-about-page), and uses PascalCasing for JavaScript classes in ES6/TypeScript (MyAboutPage). Using this convention, developers can pick up any Ionic 2 project and quickly become productive, similar to Rails.

  • 目录名称 /app/pages/my-about-page/
  • 文件名称 my-about-page.html
  • scss样式 .myaboutpage
  • Class名称 MyAboutPage

item.title: ionicCreator实际体验与评测
item.description:
ionicCreator实际体验与评测

免费版

  • 目前只支持ionic 1.0
  • 页面修改Routing URL，导出项目templates中page名未变化，依然是page1-n
  • components 组件少，且不可定制
  • 全程需要翻墙
  • 不实用，不如参考css文档，直接使用html写所需的页面

使用creator构建的一个测试项目：

https://creator.ionic.io/share/a5d70d07f53f

## 代理从creator创建项目到本地
http_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:8118 ionic start coinnova creator:a5d70d07f53f

## 登录ionic
cd coinnova
ionic login

## 修改后提交项目
ionic push

Pro版

  • 必须认证信用卡后，才可免费体验一个月
  • creator使用功能无明显提升
  • 允许1个私有项目

Team版

  • 必须认证信用卡后，才可免费体验一个月
  • creator使用功能无明显提升
  • 允许2个私有项目
